track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description: Welcome to the 11th edition of HourRank! It's a one-hour rated contest with 3/4 algorithmic challenges. Are you fast and accurate enough to win it?
primary_contest.name: HourRank 11
